# Python bytecode
__pycache__/
*.pyc
*.pyo
*.pyd
.Python

# Distribution / packaging
.eggs/
*.egg-info/
dist/
build/
*.whl
*.zip

# IDE specific files
.vscode/ # If you want to ignore VS Code settings for collaborators
.idea/   # If you use PyCharm/IntelliJ

# Specific files generated by the game that might not need to be tracked
# high_score.txt # Uncomment this line if you want each clone to start with a fresh high score
